channel.title: CVE Feed for WaspThemes -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for WaspThemes -- all products

item.title: CVE-2024-47348|2024-10-06T10:28:19.609Z -- waspthemes -- yellowpencil%20visual%20css%20style%20editor
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in WaspThemes YellowPencil Visual CSS Style Editor allows Reflected XSS.This issue affects YellowPencil Visual CSS Style Editor: from n/a through 7.6.4.

item.title: CVE-2024-43963|2024-08-29T17:45:18.352Z -- waspthemes -- yellowpencil%20visual%20css%20style%20editor
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in WaspThemes YellowPencil Visual CSS Style Editor allows Reflected XSS.This issue affects YellowPencil Visual CSS Style Editor: from n/a through 7.6.1.
